    • Method Detail

      • createMessage

        public CNMessage createMessage(CNContact sender,
                      java.lang.String text,
                      int options,
                      int expiration)
        Create a message and add it to this conversation.
        Parameters:
        sender - The account of the user that is sending the message.
        text - The content to be sent.
        options - message flags.
        expiration - How long the user will be able to read the message. -1 for unlimited.
        Returns:
        A new message object to be sent.
